SEARCH
Package com.ayushsingh

Class DBOperations

java.lang.Object
com.ayushsingh.DBOperations
public class DBOperations extends Object
This class represents the operations to interact with the database regarding product management. It provides methods to create a table, insert, read, update, and delete products from the database. The methods are used in the App class.
Since:
12-05-2024
Version:
1.0
Author:
Ayush Singh

  • Method Details

    • createTable

      public static void createTable() throws SQLException
      Creates the 'products' table in the database The table contains columns for product ID, name, price, and quantity.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a SQL exception occurs while executing the create table query.

    • insertProduct

      public static void insertProduct(String productName, double productPrice, int productQuantity) throws SQLException
      Inserts a new product into the 'products' table using a prepared statement.
      Parameters:
      productName - The name of the product to be inserted.
      productPrice - The price of the product to be inserted.
      productQuantity - The quantity of the product to be inserted.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a SQL exception occurs while executing the insert query.

    • readProducts

      public static ResultSet readProducts() throws SQLException
      Reads all products from the 'products' table and returns the result set.
      Returns:
      ResultSet containing product data retrieved from the database.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a SQL exception occurs while executing the select query.

    • updateProductPrice

      public static void updateProductPrice(int productId, double newPrice) throws SQLException
      Updates the price of a product in the 'products' table based on the product ID.
      Parameters:
      productId - The ID of the product to update.
      newPrice - The new price to set for the product.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a SQL exception occurs while executing the update query.

    • deleteProduct

      public static void deleteProduct(int productId) throws SQLException
      Deletes a product from the 'products' table based on the product ID.
      Parameters:
      productId - The ID of the product to delete.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a SQL exception occurs while executing the delete query.
